GameData:
-
-
The Estate of Mugenkan -
Mugenkan -
Dream -
Welcome, great Yuuka Kazami, the Beauty of Everlasting Darkness, the Flower Master of Four Seasons, Gensokyo's Sleeping Terror![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You have seen Gensokyo that was and the Gensokyo that is, from within your home of Mugenkan, the Manor of Dreams, beneath the Lake of Blood. Your history is shrouded in rumor and legend: Some believe you to be "merely" a flower youkai of peerless might and ambition. Some believe you to have been a fairy whose will to power transcended the concept of nature itself. Some believe you to be an incomprehensible horror, slumbering since the dawn of time. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] What they can all agree on is that you are one of the most dangerous, powerful, respected and feared beings ever to walk the Earth. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Great and terrible Yuuka, the humans, youkai and fairies of Gensokyo throw themselves at your feet, begging for your protection and leadership, offering their fealty in exchange for your mercy. Too long have you slumbered, content in your home -- it is time to show this world the meaning of power! With your power to cultivate and enrich life, and the power to scorch it away, shall you cultivate a civilization that can stand the test of time?
-
The Estate of Mugenkan -
.
-
Yuuka Kazami feminine
-
Yuuka Kazami -
Flower Master Of Four Seasons -
Ultimate Sadistic Creature -
TH04 ~ TH09 -
About -
-
Internal trade routes provide +100% [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and have no prerequisite buildings. -
Lotus Land Sovereign
-
Sunflower Field -
The Sunflower Field yields one Culture, plus one additional Culture for every adjacent Sunflower Field. Can only be built on flat Plains or Grassland, and preserving the flowers according to Yuuka's wishes costs Gold every turn and prevents any other yield from being harvested. -
Yuuka Kazami, Flower Master of Four Seasons, cares for the beauty of nature far more than the value of life, and establishes beautiful groves of sunflowers all over her territory. Popular cultural centers and tourist attractions for humans and youkai alike... so long as you don't disturb them.
-
Flower Tank -
A hybrid artillery unit capable of ranged bombardment and direct assault. Moves implacably over all terrain. -
Originally created by Rika to serve as the Stage 1 boss in Touhou 02 ~ Story of Eastern Wonderland, the Flower Tank was later adapted by Yuuka Kazami as a weapons platform that fit all her needs: deadly, flower-based, and fitting into the PC-98's color palette. -
The Flower Tank is Yuuka Kazami's unique unit, replacing the Cannon. While it has the same bombardment strength as a Cannon, its direct combat strength is actually higher and it has no restriction against attacking directly, allowing it to conquer cities. It also doesn't need to set up to fire, and moves implacably over all terrain.
-

Very well.
All right.
Certainly.
We're in agreement.
Oh, fine.
If I must.
Excellent.
This does not end well for you.
Soon, I'm going to reduce you to a mist of atoms.
You have just thrown your life away.
Let's play "Genocide". [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] You're "it".
I am impressed you have managed to live this long. I suppose that means it's time for me to get serious!
You're in my way. Time to remedy that.
You may have defeated my empire, but not my legend. Tales of bloodthirsty, red-eyed Yuuka will haunt your people's nightmares for generations to come.
I suppose this new world really does have no place for old relics like me.
Well done, you beat me. Now, if you're ready to see what REALLY happens, start another game as Mugenkan!
I am not in the mood to mince words. Give me this or die.
Would you part with this? I need it.
This. I want it.
No.
Absolutely not.
No way.
Of course not.
Unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
I beg your pardon?
Huh? Who is it at this hour? I am Yuuka Kazami, now why did you wake me up?
Hahaha! It's funny, seeing your kind show up here. I'm Yuuka Kazami of Mugenkan. Charmed.
Hello. I'm Yuuka Kazami, Flower Master of Four Seasons. I am here to make the flowers of this world blossom... among other things.
Good day.
Until next time.
Goodbye.
I'll be seeing you.
I have flowers to water.
That will be all.
Our business here is done.
Welcome back to Mugenkan. Abstain from harming the flowers, and we should be fine.
I see your found your way back to Mugenkan. The path through the Lake of Blood is hard to miss.
Hello again. I hope you're enjoying the garden.
Pleasant day. What can the Flower Master of Four Seasons do for you?
Well, if it isn't my hated enemy!
I have more important things to be doing than wasting time with you.
What is it this time?
Go ahead.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Yes?
You were saying?
And?
Go on.
Ha, I'm actually impressed. Next time I might have to take you seriously.
You are trying my patience.
Every unreasonable request you make is bringing you closer to something terrible.
If you aren't going to make a fair offer, I'm going to leave.
I can't make that deal, even for you. I need more.
Sorry. I need more for that.
What about me led you to believe I would give this away for that little?
You have to do better than that.
As if the waste of my time wasn't bad enough? No.
I'm sorry, but I simply can't.
I can't make this deal. No.
Hmph. I'll take it, then.
This is clearly fair. I accept.
Done.
For a change of pace, I am going to try and be magnanimous and offer a trade with you.
Since we are such good friends, making a trade like this should be no trouble.
I think making a trade would be helpful to the both of us.
You actually have the gall to demand tribute? From me? I feel like your audacity should be humorous but, nope, it just pisses me off.
I'm given to understand that helping each other out of jams is what friends do, but sadly I simply can't.
Ha ha! Oh, you're going to be a fun one, I can tell.
Take it. I will enjoy taking it back from you by force.
I am given to understand that helping each other out of jams is what friends do, so, I will deliver the resources you request.
Hmm. Okay, I'll play your game for now. Take it.
How foolish.
Let me remind you just who it is you're presuming to play chicken with.
Ha! You have guts. I think I'll even reward your audacity... for now.
I wonder what sort of flowers bloom in Hell...[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Be sure to report back to me, won't you?
